root.name: The Dreadnaught Factor
root.description: IntroductionZorban Dreadnaughts, the largest, most heavily-armored battlecraft ever, approach the planet Terra.As a pilot of the sleek Novaray Hyperfighter, you have defeated all prior intergalactic adversaries. But this time... you wonder.There's lightning action, unbelievable sound and amazing stellar graphics.Try to eliminate The Dreadnaught Factor. You are Terra's last hope.
